objects.description: [InvisiMole](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0260) has disguised its droppers as legitimate software or documents, matching their original names and locations, and saved its files as mpr.dll in the Windows folder.(Citation: ESET InvisiMole June 2018)(Citation: ESET InvisiMole June 2020)

external_references.description: Hromcová, Z. (2018, June 07). InvisiMole: Surprisingly equipped spyware, undercover since 2013. Retrieved July 10, 2018.
Hromcova, Z. and Cherpanov, A. (2020, June). INVISIMOLE: THE HIDDEN PART OF THE STORY. Retrieved July 16, 2020.
